highlights: Working on technologies like python, django, celery, postgres, mysql,  grafana, influx, aws lambda, aws kinesis, aws s3 and more.
Experience in working with recruitment & healthcare domains
Writing detailed design docs that incorporates all agreed on requirements in PRD, ensuring that PM, QA & other contributors understand it
Completing product development on time based on the design doc. This includes breaking down of tasks, assigning to sprints, resolving dependencies & testing in non-staging environments
Writing readable & maintainable code using TDD approach using best python best practices and code quality tools like formatters & linters.
Guiding & mentoring junior developers and conducting knowledge based sessions in the organisation.
Worked on technologies like python, django, mongoDB, mySQL, javascript, angularJS and more.
Working closely with client servicing team, understanding and implementing client's requirement at front-end & back-end.
Designing, writing & maintaining server side modules such as data-storage systems, REST APIs, automated tools/scripts, emailers.
Designing & implementing UX & UI in mobile app, web & emails.
Exploring new technologies, conducting R&Ds & prototyping POCs  for new developments & enhancements.
